EmailTemplate.subject: Potential Violation of a Confidential File Being Shared to All Internal Employees
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear Compliance Team, Non- Compliance Files are uploaded in chatter is now pending for your verification. Please login and review the excel report by clicking the following link: URL - {!Flagged_File_Post__c.Link} Steps : 1]Click on the 'LinktoFile'. 2]Verify the file. 3]If file is of non-compliance type then delete it. 3]Open 'Flagged File Post' custom object. 3]Go to 'Flagged File Post' record of that file and update the fields 'Chatter File Verified?' and 'comments'. Thank you.
